scripts.init: node_modules/.bin/meta git update && node_modules/.bin/meta npm install
scripts.update: node_modules/.bin/meta git pull origin master && node_modules/.bin/meta npm install
scripts.build: cd ui && npm run build && cd ../qsim && npm run build
scripts.start: node_modules/.bin/concurrently -n api,ui,sphere "npm run serve-api" "npm run serve-ui" "npm run serve-sphere"
